body_html:
If you want to get funky, you can actually do CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=3,1,2 and asking for 0 will get you device 3, asking for 1 will get you device 1 and asking for device 2 will get you device 2.
This may be a bit confusing at first but it is actually quite powerful !
